models.campaign

Class Campaign

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.campaign.Campaign
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Campaign
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A campaign is a set of level that has a story A campaign must always have a description
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • Campaign

        public Campaign(java.lang.String name,
        java.util.ArrayList<Level> levels,
        java.lang.String description,
        int currentLevel)
        Constructor to create a campaign with all of its parts. To be used in Loading Campaigns
        Parameters:
        name - The current name of the campaign
        levels - The current levels in the campaign
        description - The current description of the campaign
        currentLevel - The current level that the user is on
